text: (ihata sandahan) meva apage sadharana tarkayayi. ibrahim tama janatava (vivadayen) jayagrahanaya kirima sandaha api meva ohuta (uganva) dunnemu. api adahas karannange padavi usaskara harinnemu. (nabiye!) niyata vasayenma obage deviyan itamat gnanayenda, buddhiyenda piri keneku vasayen sitinneya
